PerfectNetExp.abs: ON THE FORMATION AND SPLITTING OF GONDWANALAND试论冈瓦纳古陆的形成和裂解

means.word_mean: 1. a hypothetical continent that (according to plate tectonic theory) broke up later into India and Australia and Africa and South America and Antarctica

auth_sentence.content: Their forebears probably lived in caves on the prehistoric southern super-continent Gondwanaland.
